name: Helix Monster - Scary Jump
description:
Helix bounce is a free ball game, highly addictive and easy to get the hang of. Come give it a try! Experience a new relaxing way of falling from the top of a tower and feel the great pleasure it brings you!

How To Play
>One-touch easy-to-learn controls, just slide your finger!
>Jump over obstacles to help the monster get to the end.
>The deeper you get, the more fun you will find!
>Embark on an exciting adventure to the center of the Earth!
